judicialResults.resultText:
COEW - Community order England / Wales
Community order made. The defendant must comply with the requirements (shown below) by 31/08/2025. This order to be reviewed In two months. First review on 16/10/2024 at 10:30 at Croydon Crown Court, Courtroom 01.

judicialResults.label: Drug rehabilitation residential with review

nextHearing.probationTeamName: South East and Eastern Division NPS

judicialResults.resultText:
DRR - Drug rehabilitation residential with review
Drug Rehabilitation Requirement: Have treatment for drug dependency by or under the direction of London Mags Court at London Rehab Centre as a resident for 3 Months. To be reviewed Monthly. First review on 14/09/2024 at 10:30 at City of London Magistrates' Court, courtroom Courtroom 01.
judicialResults.welshLabel: Adsefydlu defnyddiwr cyffuriau - preswyl gydag adolygiad
